@graph.name: Vegan Pepper Jack Cheese with Almond Milk. Glutenfree Recipe - Vegan Richa
@graph.description: This Dairy free Vegan Pepper Jack Cheese is easy, ready within minutes & it shreds, melts. Made with almond milk, nooch, chickpea flour. Almond Milk Cheese

itemListElement.name: Vegan Pepper Jack Cheese with Almond Milk. Glutenfree Recipe

@graph.name: Almond Milk Pepper Jack cheese
@graph.description: This Almond Milk Pepper jack shreds and melts. Super easy and quick to whip up. Free of Dairy, egg, soy, gluten. can be made corn-free
recipeIngredient: 1.5 Tbsp tapioca starch or use arrowroot starch
1/2 tsp garlic powder or use 1 tsp garlic paste
2.5 tsp agar powder (see note for agar flakes)
1/2 tsp or more red pepper flakes

recipeInstructions.text: Grease a glass container with extra virgin olive oil and keep ready. In a bowl, whisk 1/2 cup almond milk with the starches, chickpea flour, nutritional yeast, extra virgin olive oil, vinegar, lemon juice, spices and salt.
recipeInstructions.name: Grease a glass container with extra virgin olive oil and keep ready. In a bowl, whisk 1/2 cup almond milk with the starches, chickpea flour, nutritional yeast, extra virgin olive oil, vinegar, lemon juice, spices and salt.

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan, add 1 cup of almond milk and agar powder and heat on medium heat, Bring to a rolling boil and cook for 4 mins.
recipeInstructions.name: In a pan, add 1 cup of almond milk and agar powder and heat on medium heat, Bring to a rolling boil and cook for 4 mins.

recipeInstructions.text: Reduce heat to low and slowly add in the almond milk starch mixture from step 1 and mix.
recipeInstructions.name: Reduce heat to low and slowly add in the almond milk starch mixture from step 1 and mix.

recipeInstructions.text: Increase heat to medium and continue to mix and cook for 4 to 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Increase heat to medium and continue to mix and cook for 4 to 5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the pepper flakes and fold in. Carefully (the mix will be hot) taste and adjust salt, tang (lemon juice) and spice. You want it to be slightly more saltier, spicier in the liquid state.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the pepper flakes and fold in. Carefully (the mix will be hot) taste and adjust salt, tang (lemon juice) and spice. You want it to be slightly more saltier, spicier in the liquid state.

recipeInstructions.text: Take off heat and pour in a well greased glass container. Let set in the refrigerator for at least an hour. Use a large grater to shred and use.
recipeInstructions.name: Take off heat and pour in a well greased glass container. Let set in the refrigerator for at least an hour. Use a large grater to shred and use.
